Name: Similarity between termn in a Data table
Description: Look for similarity between terms in a Data Table.

Properties.Name: Term to be found
Properties.Description: Term that you'd like to be found

Properties.Name: DataTable
Properties.Description: Data table that where will be search the term.

Properties.Name: Similarity to be found
Properties.Description: Similarity that you want to be found.

Properties.Name: Look for the biggest similarity
Properties.Description: Set this parameter to "True" if you want to look for the biggest similarity term in the entire Data Table. Set this parameter to "False" if you just want to get the term that hit the similarity defined.

Properties.Name: Column name
Properties.Description: Column name where will be search the term.
